scene.name: start
scene.description:
****************************************
 *** The Mansion of Professor Ludlow ****
 ****************************************
 Adapted from a D&D module by James Ward

"+ You are on a camping trip with a large group of boyscouts. During a nighttime hike, you get separated from the rest of the group.
 You stumble upon a meadow. There in front of you is a large mansion. You hear an eary plea for help coming from inside. What do you do?

choice.description: Knock on the front door
Open the front door without knocking
Knock on the front door

scene.name: no_response
scene.description: No one comes to the door and you hear nothing. A few minutes pass. Still nothing.

choice.description: Knock again
Open the front door without knocking
Return to the rest of your group

scene.name: inside_entrance
scene.description:
The double door is unlocked and opens easily.
 The beam of your flashligh reveals an empty hallway with a mirror at the opposite end. 
 There are openings that lead to rooms on the right and left.
 The hall has inch-thick red carpeting
 and walnut-paneled walls. The mirror at the end runs from the
 floor to the twenty-foot-high ceiling and covers the forty feet of wall
 section on that south face of the hall.

choice.description: Go through left opening
Go through right opening
Tamper with mirror at the end of the hall.

scene.name: rat_room
scene.description:
There are leaves on the floor, and an old worn out couch in the north east corner.
 There is a musty smell to the room,
 and leaves are littered on the floor. The couch is an old, dusty,
 overstuffed relic with several cushions and rips on all parts of it. The
 room measures sixty feet east and west and forty feet north and
 south, if paced out. There is a door on the east side of the room.

choice.description: Inspect the couch.
Sift through the leaves on the floor.
TGo through the door on the east side.

scene.name: rat_attack
scene.description: Rats com out from under the couch and attack you. One bites you and gives you a terrible disease.\n (Suggestion: maybe we should have generated melee combat here so the outcome is random.)

scene.name: key
scene.description: You find a golden key under the pile of leaves.\n (Suggestion: keep an inventory of items that the player has.)

scene.name: C
scene.description:
The beam of your flashlight show a hall with pink walls and a floor of red marble. The walls have clean squares all
 over them where pictures were obviously once hung, but are no
 longer. The floor has dried leaves littering it. If paced out, the hall is
 eighty feet long east and west and twenty feet long north and south. The hall leads to another room at the end. ",

choice.description: Proceed into the room at the end of the hall.

scene.name: D
scene.description:
The beam of the flashlight shows a room with gray painted
 walls and a cement floor. It is filled with wooden crates and there are
 leaves all over the room in large piles.
 There are 200 empty wooden 
 crates of differing sizes, and the biggest concentration of leaves is in
 the southwest corner of the room. The room measures sixty feet east
 and west and forty feet north and south and has a side alcove to the
 south starting on the east wall that is forty feet long east and west and
 twenty feet long north and south; it is here that the concentration of
 leaves is located. Behind a big crate along the east wall, thirty feet
 from the north corner, one finds a door with a normal handle.
",

choice.description: Go through door behind big crate.
Look inside all the crates.
ift through the pile of leaves.

scene.name: crates
scene.description: It takes you a really long time, but you finally open and inspect all the crates." + You find nothing in them except for leaves, dust, and 200 paperclips. ",

choice.description: Proceed into the room at the end of the hall.

scene.name: D_leaves
scene.description: There are snakes in the leaves. A group of 3 4 foot long rattlesnakes attack. (HP: 10,8,5; #AT: 1; damage:1-3; AC: 5; SA: Save versus death caused by poison).

choice.description: Proceed into the room at the end of the hall.

scene.name: E
scene.description:
The beam of your flashlight shows a room with gray painted
 walls and a cement floor. It is filled with boxes and barrels.
 There are thirteen barrels of grain
 alcohol each with the number "50" painted on it. There are thirteen
 boxes filled with pairs of white gloves. A metal chest contains a silver
 set made to serve eighteen people, four pairs of silver candlesticks,
 three huge silver carving knives (like short swords), and eighteen
 solid silver goblets (total worth of the silver items is 20,000 silver
 pieces). There are thirteen chests filled with books about plants;
 thirteen boxes filled with assorted sizes of clay pots; and ten large
 crates with mattresses in them. When paced out, the room is forty
 feet wide east and west and sixty feet wide north and south. A door
 on the east wall is originally hidden by the mattress crates.
 When you enter the room,
 are immediately attacked by an incredibly old man dressed in
 rags and carrying a butcher knife (HP: 7; #AT: 1; 0: 1-6; AC: 10; SA:
 None). This old man leaps out from behind some of the boxes and
 surprises you. ", //" He will never follow a retreating group out
 // "of the room, but will act dangerously at all other times and will never
 //"listen to any type of reason.

choice.description: Proceed into the room at the end of the hall.

scene.name: mirror
scene.description: You find that the mirror lifts easily. There is a secrete door behind it.

choice.description: Try to open the secret door.

scene.name: gold
scene.description: Congratulations. There is a pot of gold behind the door. You go home rich.

scene.name: boogie
scene.description: The boogie man jumps out and eats you.

scene.name: quit
scene.description: You go back to the others. They don't believe your story. You enjoy the rest of the camping trip.
